Slogan.title: We don't just follow trends. We set the standards for the next generation of supermodels.
Slogan.content: Based in Istanbul with a global network, Elite Model Turkey connects unique local talent with the world's most prestigious fashion houses.

Discovered.title: The world is waiting for you. Start your journey with Elite Model Turkey today.

AboutPage.title: Whether you are an aspiring model or a brand seeking unique talent, we are ready to write a new chapter with you.

ContactPage.title: Contact us for inquiries, collaborations, or modeling applications. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.Name: FULL NAME
ContactPage.Subject: SUBJECT

FAQ.Content: Joining the elite. Everything you need to know about our process, standards, and career paths.
FAQ.Content1: Our team will be happy to assist you.

Footer.Name: THE ELITE MODEL TURKEY
Footer.title: Elite talent opening up to the global runway.
Footer.Content: Strategic representation and sustainable career management for models positioned on the international stage, based in Istanbul.
Footer.CopyRight: © 2024 The Elite Model Turkey. All rights reserved.

MenPage.HeroContent: Our strong, charismatic, and professional male models make a difference on the global fashion stage.
MenPage.MenAreaContent1: The Elite Model Agency men's division represents the most powerful and charismatic faces of the fashion industry. Our male models stand out with their professionalism on international runways, in prestigious campaigns, and editorial shoots.
MenPage.MenAreaContent2: Featured in campaigns for world-renowned brands like Armani, Hugo Boss, and Dolce & Gabbana, our models grace the covers of prestigious men's magazines such as GQ, Esquire, and Men's Health.
MenPage.StartContent: Apply now to take your place in the male modeling world and shape your international career.

WomenPage.HeroContent: Our strong, charismatic, and professional female models make a difference on the global fashion stage.
WomenPage.WomenAreaContent1: As Elite Model Agency, our women's portfolio hosts the brightest stars of the fashion industry. Appearing on international runways, in prestigious magazines, and global campaigns, our models represent the pinnacle of the sector.
WomenPage.WomenAreaContent2: Regularly appearing at Paris, Milan, New York, and London Fashion Weeks, our models grace the covers of leading fashion magazines such as Vogue, Harper's Bazaar, and Elle.
WomenPage.JoinUsContent: Apply now to start your career in the fashion industry and take your place on the world stage.

NewFacesPage.HeroContent: We are discovering tomorrow's supermodels today. Welcome to the icons of the future.
NewFacesPage.NewFacesAreaContent1: Elite Model Agency's New Faces division is specially designed to discover and nurture the future stars of the fashion industry. We find young talents and prepare them for the world stage with professional training and guidance.
NewFacesPage.NewFacesAreaContent2: We offer special development programs, professional photo shoots, runway training, and personal development workshops for talented candidates aged 18 - 29 .
NewFacesPage.ProgramCardContent1: Professional photo shoots and portfolio preparation
NewFacesPage.ProgramCardContent2: Professional walking and stage presence training
NewFacesPage.ProgramCardContent4: Fashion industry and professional business life training
NewFacesPage.WomenCriteria1: • Age: 18 - 29 (Contestants under 18 can participate with a notarized parental consent form.)
NewFacesPage.MenCriteria1: • Age: 18 - 29 (Contestants under 18 can participate with a notarized parental consent form.)
NewFacesPage.SloganContent: Apply today to become one of the shining new stars of the fashion industry. Our professional team will contact you to discover your potential.

ApplicationPage.HeroContent: Join Elite Model Turkey. Please fill out the form below with your accurate measurements and polaroids taken in natural light.
ApplicationPage.PhotosText: Please upload recent polaroids. Wear simple clothes (e.g., plain t-shirt and jeans), no makeup, and shoot in natural light.
ApplicationPage.ToInform: By submitting this form, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
ApplicationPage.Warning: * THE PARTICIPATION FEE IS {price}. APPLICATIONS WITHOUT VISIBLE BANK PAYMENT WILL BE CONSIDERED INVALID.
